name: Patientory
description:
PTOY is the native token of the PTOYNet private permissioned blockchain storage network and currency fuel of the platform. In exchange for PTOY, users (which include patients and healthcare organizations) will be able to use the network to rent health information storage space and execute health-specific smart contract payments/transactions.

PTOY aims to drive the PTOYNET's value towards interoperability and cybersecurity. This system intends to eliminate the friction and costs of current thirdâ€‘party intermediaries when considering population health management. The storage network promises improved data integrity, reduced transaction costs, decentralization, and disintermediation of transparency/trust and directs the healthcare stakeholders to securely manage electronic medical data.
